text: No bastard shall enter into the assembly of YHWH, even to the tenth generation one belonging to him shall not enter into the assembly of YHWH.
Neither an Ammonite nor a Moabite shall enter into the assembly of YHWH, even to the tenth generation, those belonging to them shall not enter into the assembly of YHWH for all time,

Because of the matter in which they did not comfort you with bread and with water along the way during your going forth from Egypt. And because they hired Balaam, son of Beor, from Pethor in Aram-naharaim in order to curse you.
But YHWH your God was not willing to hear Balaam, and YHWH your God overturned for you the curse for blessing, for he YHWH your God loves you.
Do not seek their peace nor their good all of your days forever.
